name: 曾俊貴
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule:
Week 1: Overview
Week 2: Motion in a Straight Line
Week 3: Motion in a Straight Line
Week 4: Motion in Two and Three Dimensions
Week 5: Motion in Two and Three Dimensions
Week 6: Force
Week 7: Force
week 8: Kinetic Energy, Work, and Power
Week 9: Kinetic Energy, Work, and Power
Week 10: Midterm examination
week 11: Potential Energy and Energy Conservation
Week 12: Potential Energy and Energy Conservation
Week 13: Momentum and Collisions
Week 14: Momentum and Collisions
Week 15: Systems of Particles and Extended Objects
Week 16: Systems of Particles and Extended Objects
week 17: Circular Motion
Week 18: Circular Motion
week 19: Final examination
scorePolicy:

final examination (期末考) 30%
